messages.message:
Hey team, on the AI Hub Advancements call we went through: The analytics feature lets Managers see feedback, but thereâ€™s no way for them to action the feedback (other than changing the documents in the chatbot).
My question is: what are our plans for this? is there a ticket I can watch out for?
Additionally, there's no way currently to export the feedback but assume it's in the works :thought_balloon:

I'd be keen to understand if at some point the feedback can be fed to the model to iteratively train and improve answers. In which case positive feedback would also be good to provide to reinforce answers
similar to a prompt wrapper or customGPT for the chatbot
